page.title: 04SEA COAL
page.content: IT FIRST CAME ON THE{BEACH} IN 1939,BEFORE THE SECOND WORLD WAR STARTED. IT WAS TIPPED IN AS PIT WASTE.IT CAME ON THE BEACH BY ARIAL FLIGHT. WHEN THE TIDE COMES IN IT WASHES IT OUT TO ANOTHER PLACE FURTHER SOUTH, WHEN THE TIDE GOES OUT PEOPLE GO TO GATHER IT IN BUCKETS AND SMALL SACKS AND USE IT FOR THEIR{FIRES.} THE{COAL}WAGONS COME AND THE BULL- DOZERS COME TO FILL THE WAGONS. THE WAGONS TAKE THE COAL TO THE{POWER} {STATIONS.} BEFORE THE COAL WAS THERE IT WAS A VERY NICE BEACH FROM THE MOOR TO CRESSWELL POINT.WHEN THE N.C.B.ENDS ITS LIFE THEY MUST RESTORE THE BEACH TO ITS ORIGINAL STATE.NOW A DAYS PEOPLE GO WITH HORSES AND CARTS TO GATHER IT.
